meanings.definition: A synthetic disaccharide used as a laxative.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed lactuloses to help with constipation.
meanings.sent2: I bought some lactuloses from the pharmacy for my stomach issues.
meanings.sent3: After taking lactuloses, I felt like my tummy was on a rollercoaster!
meanings.sent4: Her relief was as sweet as lactuloses after finally being able to go to the bathroom.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of lactuloses in easing bowel movements is truly remarkable.
